title: Roped
description: **Please note that ROPED is only available at online bookstores under Eliza's contemporary romance penname E.M. GayleWelcome to Purgatory! A club for every desire…Katie has a fetish for rope and she’s had her eye on riggers Leo and Quinn for quite some time. Week after week she goes to the club and watches them tie up women from afar, while she imagines their rough rope against her own skin.Now the two hunky men have decided to make their move. But is plus-sized Katie ready to turn her fantasies into reality?**This title was previously published as Rope Dreams and is now sold as ROPED under Eliza's contemporary pen name, E.M. Gayle.
author: Eliza Gayle
